resources.string: Please check your internet connection and try again

" What is my IP" is an Android application that intends to shown you your internal & external IP.
It uses ipify.org to get external IP address.
Source is available on github https://github.com/yoavst/whatIsMyIP
The application was built by Yoav Sternberg, Which is also the developer of Quick Circle Apps, the top application for LG's Quick Circle case with more than 200,000 downloads.
